title: Get the Samsung Galaxy A35 for 19% LESS!
description: Get it for a much lower price than usual! The post Get the Samsung Galaxy A35 for 19% LESS! appeared first on Phandroid.
author: Mike Viray
excerpt: Get it for a much lower price than usual!
text: If you’re after a Samsung smartphone but don’t want to spend too much, then you might want to check out the Samsung Galaxy A35 – it’s currently one of the more affordable Samsung phones in the North American market, and it packs a lot of features which will be useful and familiar for fans of Samsung’s Galaxy smartphone brand. More importantly it’s also on sale at the moment, going for around 19% off via Amazon, making it a bit more affordable thanks to this deal. In terms of what you get with the Galaxy A35, the phone comes with a large 6.6-inch display, up to 128GB of storage (with micro SD card support), 6GB of RAM, and access to all your favourite Android apps and software features. It also comes with an IP67 rating, keeping it safe from light splashes and dusty scenarios. You can check it out using the link below. Note: this article may contain affiliate links that help support our authors and keep the Phandroid servers running. A writer and content creator with a love for tech and music, Mike is also an avid gamer as well. He and his wife are big fans of Mario Kart. If you’re after a Samsung smartphone but don’t want to spend too much, then you might want to check out the Samsung Galaxy A35 – it’s currently one of the more affordable Samsung phones in the North American market, and it packs a lot of features which will be useful and familiar for fans of Samsung’s Galaxy smartphone brand. More importantly it’s also on sale at the moment, going for around 19% off via Amazon, making it a bit more affordable thanks to this deal.

In terms of what you get with the Galaxy A35, the phone comes with a large 6.6-inch display, up to 128GB of storage (with micro SD card support), 6GB of RAM, and access to all your favourite Android apps and software features. It also comes with an IP67 rating, keeping it safe from light splashes and dusty scenarios. You can check it out using the link below.
